  1. City Council

City Council Place 2, Jerry Beck Jr.

Email Councilman Beck

Mr. Jerry Beck Jr. moved to Crowley in 1968 and has spent most of his life residing in the city. He was first elected to serve on City Council in 2004 and has been re-elected for consecutive terms ever since. He previously spent 10 years as a firefighter with the Crowley Fire Department. He serves on the city of Crowley's Crime Control & Prevention District board.

Jerry Beck Jr. City Council Place 2 817-297-2201 ext 4000 Email

City Council
